name: Black Friday Sandwich
author: evian257
summary: Yep, Thanksgiving leftovers between 2 slices of bread! Feel free to modify with whatever else you have left from the night before...uh, except the pie.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon mashed leftover sweet potato casserole with marshmallow topping
¼ cup shredded leftover cooked turkey
1 tablespoon coarsely chopped leftover green bean casserole
directions: Mash cranberry sauce in a bowl with a fork until smooth
Add mayonnaise and celery seed; mix thoroughly
Spread sweet potato casserole onto 1 slice of bread
Mash gravy and stuffing together in a bowl
Spoon the mixture over the sweet potatoes; top with green bean casserole and onions
Place second slice of bread on top
